long_description: The High-Visibility Runner's belt from SPIbelt securely and comfortably carries your small necessities, and helps keep you visible in when running at dusk or dawn. Expandable spandex pocket fits a cell phone, passport, ID card, keys and more; close fitting design doesn't bounce much when running. Bright, high-visibilty elastic waist strap won't chaffe; quick-release buckle for easy on and off. Fits waists from 25 - 50 in.
short_description: The High-Visibility Runner's belt from SPIbelt securely and comfortably carries your small necessities, and helps keep you visible in when running at dusk or dawn.
